name: Project Chroma
description:
Take the role of Ariadne and help turn back the clock on the apocalypse!

We recommend playing the tutorial before embarking on your adventure.

Run through a procedurally generated maze to find the key to open the portal, be careful the denizen's of hell will try their utmost to stop you!

For support request, mail us at: magmas@groupmail.com
